channel.title: CHICAS News
channel.description: Latest Information from the CHICAS Stats/Epi group at Lancaster

item.title: CHICAS Research Highlighted by the COR-NTD Consortium
item.description: Our research work was praised at the consortium's tenth anniversary celebration.

item.title: MSc Health Data Science Guest Talks
item.description: Our MSc Health Data Science students recently had the opportunity to hear from guest speakers across different industries about what they do in health data science, and the career paths that have led them to where they are now.

item.title: CHICAS becomes a WHO Collaborating Centre for Neglected Tropical Disease research
item.description: The World Health Organisation has officially designated Lancasterâ€™s CHICAS as a WHO Collaborating Centre on Geostatistical methods for Neglected Tropical Disease Research.

item.title: Software Skills Workshops for 2021
item.description: Level-up your research software skills with a series of Thursday workshops.

item.title: Student Project Showcase Launch
item.description: We have now launched our student showcase page, highlighting the work done by taught postgraduate students.
